job_description:
Responsibilities: - Excellent Communication Skills: Engage with customers using appropriate accent and clear communication.
- Responsibility and Target Achievement: Demonstrate a strong sense of responsibility and consistently meet daily targets.
- Analytical Skills: Utilize analytical skills to contribute to team development and problem-solving.
- Service-Oriented Competencies: Develop and apply competencies required for a service-oriented and results-focused environment.
- Flexible Working Hours: Be prepared to work on a roster basis if required only.

Requirements: - Must be a fresh graduate from any recognized institution
- Good English communication skills (preferred)
- Smart, confident, and quick learner
- Positive attitude and willingness to grow
- Basic computer skills (MS Office, Email, etc.)

**Salary & Benefits:**
- Monthly Salary: BDT 12,000 â€“ 14,000
- Career growth opportunities
- Training and professional development
- Friendly working environment
